data.title: Data & Tools
data.meta_description: Planning Broward County Transportation Now & In the Future for mass transit options including, buses, rail, cars, freight, and air.
data.text:
The Broward MPO collects various types of data related to our regionâ€™s roadway network and makes this data available to both our partners and the public. This page offers access to our most recent roadway data in the form of static maps and Geographic Information System (GIS) files.

Archived Traffic Data

Federal Functional Classification

The Federal Functional Classification process attempts to group roadways into classes, or systems, according to the character of service they provide in the year of analysis. This process helps determine eligibility of roadways for funding under federal aid programs such as the Federal Highway Administration's (FHWA's) emergency relief program.
